text: Cazal Eyewear is a luxury sunglass designer based in Germany which manufactures the Legends line of sunglasses, created by Austrian designer Cari Zalloni. Cazal sunglasses have been especially popular among hip hop artists, including Run DMC and Rick Ross. Rick Ross has a facial tattoo of the Cazal logo.
